spike.description: Sudden increase in metric value vs prior period

drop.description: Sudden decrease in metric value vs prior period

outlier.description: Data point far outside normal range (beyond 2 standard deviations)

gap.description: Missing data periods where values are null or absent

critical.description: Red indicators showing critical status or target missed by >20%

warning.description: Yellow/warning indicators approaching threshold or target missed by 10-20%

target_miss.description: Actual vs budget/forecast with negative variance

sustained_movement.description: Consecutive periods moving in the same direction

acceleration.description: Rate of change increasing period over period

reversal.description: Direction change after an established trend (3+ periods)

budget_variance.description: Actual vs budget/forecast variance exceeding threshold

peer_variance.description: Regional or product peer variance exceeding threshold
